name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: One Tab per Job for LexiQA

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reuses existing Chrome tabs for LexiQA jobs within MateCat

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use this extension in order to control the number of open tabs in Chrome when using the LexiQA on-line quality assurance tool in MateCat projects. This one-tab-per-job extension allows you to reuse the open LexiQA and MateCat tabs by eliminating the need to open new ones every time you run a new check.
